fees: Check the USCIS website for the current fee schedule for Form I-129.
description: This form is used to petition for a nonimmigrant worker to come to the United States temporarily.
processing_time: Varies based on the service center and the specific circumstances of the petition.

required_fields.name: Legal Name of Individual Petitioner
required_fields.description: Full name of the individual petitioner.

required_fields.name: Company or Organization Name
required_fields.description: Name of the company or organization filing the petition.

required_fields.name: Mailing Address
required_fields.description: Complete mailing address of the petitioner.

required_fields.name: Contact Information
required_fields.description: Daytime and mobile telephone numbers, and email address.

required_fields.name: Federal Employer Identification Number (FEIN)
required_fields.description: Tax identification number for the employer.

required_fields.name: Requested Nonimmigrant Classification
required_fields.description: Classification symbol for the nonimmigrant worker.

required_fields.name: Total number of workers included in this petition
required_fields.description: Total number of workers being petitioned for.

required_fields.name: Date of Birth
required_fields.description: Date of birth of the beneficiary.

required_fields.name: Country of Birth
required_fields.description: Country where the beneficiary was born.

submission_method: Submit the completed form to USCIS by mail or online, depending on the specific instructions provided.
target_applicants: Individuals or organizations seeking to employ nonimmigrant workers in the U.S.
discovered_by_query: USCIS Work Visa forms PDF download official
supporting_documents: Evidence of the employer's ability to pay the offered wage
Any previous petitions or applications related to the beneficiary
